descriptionHtml:
In this mod you will find a dragon companion in whiterun. You will notice that you cant talk to him but this is OK because he still follows you. you take him to your own heights off journey and he will always be your friendly loyal companion. Hope this is descriptive enough if you guys have any questions or concerns feel free to leave comment.
                              Here is a video link http://youtu.be/nVptbwrd2GI?hd=1
author: skymodder
